description: Colorino is color matching game for children ages 2 and over, classic for learning colors with characters from the popular preschool series! Colorino is a fun activity for children aged 2 and over: Choose a picture template, slide it under the pegboard and peg it out with the colourful blocks! The large pegboards are ideal for children's hands. The templates show colourful pictures from the world of the dog girl Bluey from the series of the same name. There are also motifs that are predominantly black and white. Children can design these as they wish and give free rein to their creativity. The game principle delights boys and girls alike and is fun right up to pre-school age. Colorino is the ideal gift for occasions such as Easter, Christmas or a 2nd birthday. All materials are carefully selected and tested for absolute safety. Requirements that go far beyond legal standards and constant checks guarantee maximum safety.
